TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，可检索当前组件所能访问的数据源的列表。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一些方法，这些方法可用于检索当前设计时组件可访问的数据源的列表。 provides methods that can be used to retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current design-time component. 使用此类型转换器 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 来提供 " **属性** " 窗口中的数据源列表中显示的值。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data sources in the **Properties** window. > [!CAUTION] > 永远不应直接访问类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 改为使用调用适当的转换器 。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#4)]

span.span: How to: Implement a Type Converter

override this.GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，它指示要获取其值的组件或控件。

span.span: An indicating the component or control to get values for.

summary.span: 获取控件可以访问的标准数据源。

span.span: Gets the standard data sources accessible to the control.

returns.span: ，它列出标准的可访问数据源。

span.span: A listing the standard accessible data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过从设计器检索组件列表，使用方法测试每个组件， 然后返回作为有效数据源的组件，可以确定组件可访问的数据源。The data sources that are accessible to the component are determined by retrieving a list of components from the designer, testing each component with the method, and then returning the components that are valid data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该列表是独占的（如在枚举数据类型中），则其他任何值都无效。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果列表不是独占的，则除了提供的标准值列表之外还有其他有效值 。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

para.span: 如果要转换的类型支持标准值，请重写此方法。

span.span: Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values.

param.name: component
param.span: 要检查是否为有效数据源的组件。

span.span: The component to check as a valid data source.

summary.span: 指示指定组件是否为此转换器的有效数据源。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source for this converter.

returns.span: 如果 实现了 或 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if implements or ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 方法来确定可用作标准可访问数据源的组件。The method uses the method to determine the components that are available as standard accessible data sources. 对于 类，有效的数据源是实现 或接口的组件 。For the class, a valid data source is a component that implements the or interface.

para.span: 自定义数据源转换器可从 类派生，并重写 方法，以测试将组件用作数据源所需的接口实现。

span.span: Custom data source converters can derive from the class, and override the method, to test for the interface implementations that are required to use a component as a data source.
